verses.verse: A Psalm of David, <WH1732> when he changed <WH8138> his behaviour <WH2940> before <WH6440> Abimelech; <WH40> who drove <WH1644> him away, and he departed. <WH3212> I will bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068> at all <WH3605> times: <WH6256> his praise <WH8416> shall continually <WH8548> be in my mouth. <WH6310>
My soul <WH5315> shall make her boast <WH1984> in the LORD: <WH3068> the humble <WH6041> shall hear <WH8085> thereof, and be glad. <WH8056>
O magnify <WH1431> the LORD <WH3068> with me, and let us exalt <WH7311> his name <WH8034> together. <WH3162>
I sought <WH1875> the LORD, <WH3068> and he heard <WH6030> me, and delivered <WH5337> me from all <WH3605> my fears. <WH4035>
They looked <WH5027> to him, and were lightened: <WH5102> and their faces <WH6440> were not ashamed. <WH2659>
This <WH2088> poor <WH6041> man cried, <WH7121> and the LORD <WH3068> heard <WH8085> him, and saved <WH3467> him out of all <WH3605> his troubles. <WH6869>
The angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> encamps <WH2583> round <WH5439> about them that fear <WH3373> him, and delivers <WH2502> them.
O taste <WH2938> and see <WH7200> that the LORD <WH3068> is good: <WH2896> blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that trusts <WH2620> in him.
O fear <WH3372> the LORD, <WH3068> you his saints: <WH6918> for there is no <WH369> want <WH4270> to them that fear <WH3373> him.
The young <WH3715> lions <WH3715> do lack, <WH7326> and suffer hunger: <WH7456> but they that seek <WH1875> the LORD <WH3068> shall not want <WH2637> any <WH3605> good <WH2896> thing.
Come, <WH3212> you children, <WH1121> listen <WH8085> to me: I will teach <WH3925> you the fear <WH3374> of the LORD. <WH3068>
What <WH4310> man <WH376> is he that desires <WH2655> life, <WH2416> and loves <WH157> many days, <WH3117> that he may see <WH7200> good? <WH2896>
Keep <WH5341> your tongue <WH3956> from evil, <WH7451> and your lips <WH8193> from speaking <WH1696> guile. <WH4820>
Depart <WH5493> from evil, <WH7451> and do <WH6213> good; <WH2896> seek <WH1245> peace, <WH7965> and pursue <WH7291> it.
The eyes <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068> are on the righteous, <WH6662> and his ears <WH241> are open to their cry. <WH7775>
The face <WH6440> of the LORD <WH3068> is against them that do <WH6213> evil, <WH7451> to cut <WH3772> off the remembrance <WH2143> of them from the earth. <WH776>
The righteous cry, <WH6817> and the LORD <WH3068> hears, <WH8085> and delivers <WH5337> them out of all <WH3605> their troubles. <WH6869>
The LORD <WH3068> is near <WH7126> to them that are of a broken <WH7665> heart; <WH3820> and saves <WH3467> such as be of a contrite <WH1793> spirit. <WH7307>
Many <WH7227> are the afflictions <WH7451> of the righteous: <WH6662> but the LORD <WH3068> delivers <WH5337> him out of them all. <WH3605>
He keeps <WH8104> all <WH3605> his bones: <WH6106> not one <WH259> of them is broken. <WH7665>
Evil <WH7451> shall slay <WH4191> the wicked: <WH7563> and they that hate <WH8130> the righteous <WH6662> shall be desolate. <WH816>
The LORD <WH3068> redeems <WH6299> the soul <WH5315> of his servants: <WH5650> and none <WH3808> of them that trust <WH2620> in him shall be desolate. <WH816>
